However, If all occupying borrowers are first-time homebuyers (defined as no interest in any property in the last 3 years), First-Time Home Buyer Counseling is required from Homebuyer one of the following: 1) Homebuyer Education Courses offered at no cost by UWM, 2) an online homeownership Counseling education program developed by mortgage insurance companies, 3) Homeownership education programs that meet the National Industry Standards for Homeownership Education and Counseling, or 4) programs using Freddie's CreditSmart (provided Modules 1, 2, 7, 11, and 12 are included).
